sentences.sCn: 他们住在维多利亚街18 号。

sentences.sContent: Does this train stop at Preston?
sentences.sCn: 这列火车在普雷斯顿停吗？

sentences.sContent: I was waiting at the bus stop.
Liz and her friend sat down at a corner table.
sentences.sCn: 莉兹和她的朋友在靠角落的一张桌子旁坐下。

sentences.sContent: We’ll meet at Harry’s (=  at Harry’s house  ) .
I spent an unpleasant hour at the dentist’s.
sentences.sCn: 我在牙医诊所度过了难熬的一小时。

sentences.sContent: ...let’s go look at this space on Queen Anne...
...I can definitely remember what I learned on certain days at school...
...Barbara Hagerty looks at some of the features of people who turn midlife into a rebirth...
...Consider trying to remember where you parked your car in the same car park you were at a week earlier...
...when he met his first girlfriend at his best friend's 16th birthday party...
...I would like to sell the laptop at 1500 yuan...
...Dogs in the study looked most at the eyes of humans and other dogs to sense their emotions...
...you could also visit me at my dorm: 101Room at Dorm 1...
...they seem to be no better than average at recalling impersonal information...
...I remember sitting on a bench with my aunt at a yoga studio...

synos.tran: 在（表示存在或出现的地点、场所、位置、空间）；以（某种价格、速度等）；向；因为；朝；忙于

phrases.pCn: [口语]争吵；重复负面消极的行为(此语亦可含有与性行为有关的意思)

trans.tranOther: used to say exactly where something or someone is, or where something happens
